name: Cube (itch) (TeamCube)
description:
Cube is a 3 players skill game.
Each player control one cube (blue, pink and yellow).
They have to work as a team to reproduce in a limited time a serie of patterns.
Cube was developed in 4 days during a game jam organized by Isart Digital.
At this event, we won the Grand Prize and the award for best graphic design.
The team was composed of 8 students:

Game Artists

  • Charlotte Couderc
  • Perrine Lozinguez
  • Garance Royère
  • Tamara Strub
  • Nicolas Tham

Sound Designers

  • Benjamin Buzzi
  • Maxime Vatopoulos

Developer

  • Rémi Carreira

Platform: PC
Engine: Unity 5
Number of players: 3

Install instructions
  • Download the complete game folder on your computer
  • Plug 3 Xbox Controllers
  • Launch Cube.exe
Controls
  • Left Joystick : Move Left/Right
  • A Button : Jump

Check out our other projects:

  • Naraa, the living book
  • Alfred
